custom-sql.sql: SELECT SUM(cr.result) / COUNT(1) AS avgResult FROM user_ u INNER JOIN users_groups ug ON u.userId = ug.userId INNER JOIN lms_course co ON co.groupCreatedId = ug.groupId INNER JOIN lms_courseresult cr ON cr.courseId = co.courseId AND cr.userId = u.userId AND cr.passedDate IS NOT NULL [$WHERECOURSEOREDITIONS$]
SELECT lms_courseresult.* FROM lms_courseresult INNER JOIN lms_course ON lms_courseresult.courseId = lms_course.courseId WHERE lms_course.parentCourseId = ? AND lms_courseresult.userId = ?;
